function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging people to return to work and use private vehicles may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission in public spaces.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and potential overcrowding in public spaces.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and implement strict sanitation measures in public transport and workplaces.","Technologies":"Sanitization stations, contactless payment systems, and ventilation systems for public transport.","People":"Commuters, general public, and employees in workplaces.","Owner":"Transport authorities, employers, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Increased use of public transport and active travel may lead to overcrowding in public spaces, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of close contact and transmission of contagious diseases in crowded areas.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, regulate the number of passengers, and promote the use of face masks in public transport and crowded areas.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, communication apps for passenger updates, and automated attendance systems.","People":"Commuters, travelers, and individuals using public spaces.","Owner":"Transport authorities, venue operators, and local governments."}]}
